org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.transactional

Class TxCollectionLayoutFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.common.BaseFactory
      • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.transactional.TxCollectionLayoutFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseLayoutFactory, GraphCollectionLayoutFactory<GraphHead,Vertex,Edge>

    public class TxCollectionLayoutFactory
extends BaseFactory
implements GraphCollectionLayoutFactory<GraphHead,Vertex,Edge>
    Responsible for producing instances of TxCollectionLayout.

      • fromTransactions

        public GraphCollectionLayout<GraphHead,Vertex,Edge> fromTransactions(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> transactions)
        Description copied from interface: GraphCollectionLayoutFactory
        Creates a graph collection layout from a graph transaction dataset. Overlapping vertices and edge are merged by Id comparison only.

        Returns:
        graph collection layout

      • fromTransactions

                                                                     org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupReduceFunction<Edge,Edge> edgeMergeReducer)
        Description copied from interface: GraphCollectionLayoutFactory
        Creates a graph collection layout from graph transactions. Overlapping vertices and edge are merged using provided reduce functions.
        Specified by:
        fromTransactions in interface GraphCollectionLayoutFactory<GraphHead,Vertex,Edge>
        Parameters:
        transactions - transaction dataset
        vertexMergeReducer - vertex merge function
